00022 /**
00023  * @file   SnpTable.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Thu Feb  9 16:29:28 2006
00026  *
00027  * @brief Big table of genotype data. Rows are snp probesets, columns are
00028  * experiments. Entries are -1 = NN, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, 2 = BB
00029  */
00030 
00031 
00032 #include "file/TsvFile/SnpTable.h"
00033 
00034 using namespace affx;
00035 
00036 /**
00037  * Read in genotypes from a file that looks like
00038  * probeset_id [tab] chip1 [tab] chip2 [tab]... chipN
00039  * SNP_A-1889420 [tab] -1 [tab] 0 [tab] 2 [tab] ... 1
00040  *
00041  * Entries are -1 = NN, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, 2 = BB
00042  * @param fileName - name of file to open.
00043  */
00044 void SnpTable::open(const std::string& fileName)
00045 {
00046   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00047   std::string snpName;
00048   std::vector<int> gTypes;
00049   tsv.open(fileName);
00050   int colCount = tsv.getColumnCount(0);
00051   tsv.bind(0, "probeset_id", &snpName);
00052   gTypes.resize(colCount - 1);
00053   /* Bind up the variables. */
00054   for (int i = 1; i < colCount; i++) {
00055     std::string s;
00056     tsv.cidx2cname(0, i, s);
00057     m_ColNames.push_back(s);
00058     tsv.bind(0, i, &gTypes[i-1]);
00059     m_ColNameMap[s] = i - 1;
00060   }
00061   int count = 0;
00062   while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00063     m_RowNames.push_back(snpName);
00064     m_GTypes.push_back(gTypes);
00065     m_RowNameMap[snpName] = count++;
00066   }
00067   tsv.close();
00068 }
00069 
00070 /** @brief     Return the number of rows in the file
00071  *  @return    rows
00072  */
00073 int SnpTable::getNumRows()
00074 {
00075   return (int)m_GTypes.size();
00076 }
00077 
00078 /** @brief     Return the number of columns in the file.
00079  *  @return    columns
00080  */
00081 int SnpTable::getNumCols()
00082 {
00083   return m_GTypes.empty() ? 0 : (int)m_GTypes[0].size();
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 /** @brief     Get the name of row rowIx
00088  *  @param     rowIx
00089  *  @return    the name
00090  */
00091 const std::string &SnpTable::getRowName(int rowIx)
00092 {
00093   assert(rowIx < (int)m_RowNames.size());
00094   return m_RowNames[rowIx];
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 /** @brief  Get the name of column colIx
00099  *  @param  colIx
00100  *  @return the name
00101  */
00102 const std::string &SnpTable::getColName(int colIx)
00103 {
00104   assert(colIx < (int)m_ColNames.size());
00105   return m_ColNames[colIx];
00106 }
00107 
00108 /**
00109  * Find the row index associated with a particular identified, -1 if
00110  * not found.
00111  *
00112  * @param s - row identifier.
00113  * @return - index if found, -1 otherwise.
00114  */
00115 int SnpTable::getRowIndex(const std::string &s)
00116 {
00117   std::map<std::string, int>::iterator iter = m_RowNameMap.find(s);
00118   if (m_RowNameMap.end() == iter)
00119     return -1;
00120   else
00121     return iter->second;
00122 }
00123 
00124 /**
00125  * Find the col index associated with a particular identified, -1 if
00126  * not found.
00127  *
00128  * @param s - col identifier.
00129  * @return - index if found, -1 otherwise.
00130  */
00131 int SnpTable::getColIndex(const std::string &s)
00132 {
00133   std::map<std::string, int>::iterator iter = m_ColNameMap.find(s);
00134   if (m_ColNameMap.end() == iter)
00135     return -1;
00136   else
00137     return iter->second;
00138 }
00139 
00140 /**
00141  * Get the genotype for the particular row and index of the genotype matrix.
00142  *
00143  * @param rowIndex - Row of interest.
00144  * @param colIndex - Column of interest.
00145  * @return the genotype requested.
00146  */
00147 int SnpTable::getGenotypeForSnp(int rowIndex, int colIndex)
00148 {
00149   assert(rowIndex < (int)m_GTypes.size());
00150   assert(colIndex < (int)m_GTypes[0].size());
00151   return m_GTypes[rowIndex][colIndex];
00152 }
